example.captcha
Interface ClusteredImageCaptchaFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
CookieImageCaptchaFactory, DefaultCaptchaFactory
public interface ClusteredImageCaptchaFactory

Class implementing this interface has the responsibility to build image captcha for a clustered environment (e.g. multiple, load balanced HTTP servers not using sticky sessions).

Method Summary
 ClusteredImageCaptcha getImageCaptcha()
          Builds a image captcha.
 

Method Detail

getImageCaptcha

ClusteredImageCaptcha getImageCaptcha()
                                      throws com.octo.captcha.CaptchaException
Builds a image captcha.

Returns:
a image captcha
Throws:
com.octo.captcha.CaptchaException - if unable to generate image captcha
